verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Unto thee, O <S%H3068>Jehova<s%>, do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
O my <S%H430>God<s%>, in thee have I <S%H982>trusted<s%>, Let me not be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>; Let not mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> triumph over <S%H5970>me<s%>.
Yea <S%H6960><s%>, none that wait for thee shall be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>: They shall be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> that deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%> without <S%H7387>cause<s%>.
Show <S%H3045><s%> me thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me thy <S%H734>paths<s%>.
Guide <S%H1869><s%> me in thy <S%H571>truth<s%>, and <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>; For thou art the God of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; For thee do I <S%H6960>wait<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> and thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>; For they have been ever of <S%H5769>old<s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> not the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth<s%>, nor my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: According to thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> thou <S%H2898>me<s%>, For thy goodness' <S%H3068>sake<s%>, O Jehovah.
Good <S%H2896><s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%> is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Therefore will he <S%H3384>instruct<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
The <S%H6035>meek<s%> will he <S%H1869>guide<s%> in <S%H4941>justice<s%>; And the <S%H6035>meek<s%> will he <S%H3925>teach<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>.
All the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> Unto such as <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
For thy <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H3068>sake<s%>, O Jehovah, <S%H5545>Pardon<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, for it is <S%H7227>great<s%>.
What <S%H376>man<s%> is he that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>? Him shall he <S%H3384>instruct<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he shall <S%H977>choose<s%>.
His <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3885>dwell<s%> at <S%H2896>ease<s%>; And his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.
The <S%H5475>friendship<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is with them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3045>him<s%>; And he will show them his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.
Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8548>ever<s%> toward <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For he will <S%H3318>pluck<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> out of the <S%H7568>net<s%>.
Turn <S%H6437><s%> thee unto <S%H2603>me<s%>, and have mercy upon <S%H3173>me<s%>; For I am desolate and <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>.
The <S%H6869>troubles<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> are <S%H7337>enlarged<s%>: Oh bring thou me <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H4691>distresses<s%>.
Consider <S%H7200><s%> mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H5999>travail<s%>; And <S%H5375>forgive<s%> all my <S%H2403>sins<s%>.
Consider <S%H7200><s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, for they are <S%H7231>many<s%>; And they <S%H8130>hate<s%> me with <S%H2555>cruel<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%>.
Oh <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H954>me<s%>: Let me not be put to shame, for I take refuge in <S%H2620>thee<s%>.
Let <S%H8537>integrity<s%> and <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> <S%H6960>me<s%>, For I wait for thee.
Redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, Out all of his <S%H6869>troubles<s%>.
